reviews.review: They don't make villain's as memorable,well written, and malicious as GLaDos anymore.

Gra pomimo iż wyszła sporo lat temu graficznie się jakoś bardzo nie zestarzała, wciąž fajnie się gra a jeśli ktoś już wszystko w tej grze ukończył polecam ograć portal 2 (trochę się spóźniłem z tą recenzją XD)

Интересная головоломка в стиле Valve. С багами, но классным геймплеем
Great game, puzzles get more challenging as you go and a very interesting story followed up in portal 2.
虽然今年已经2022年了，但是它依旧刷新了我对游戏的认知

[b]The cake is a lie![/b]

[hr][/hr]
[h2]优点[/h2]
[b]一步一脚印地引导[/b]，基本不会遇到卡关的情况，游戏体验如丝般顺畅（可能）。与 2 代不同的是，2 代需要跟作者的脑电波对上，这代就是考验理解和反应能力的[strike]，我可怜的小脑袋在 Test Chamber 18 里把同伴方块的位置放错了，卡了半天才想起来可以换位置[/strike]。
[b]关卡设计出色[/b]，Test Chamber 18 里的焚化炉、逃脱时帮你打破玻璃的火箭炮台就跟最后与 GLaDOS 的战斗很好地联系了起来[strike]，我没看开发者注释，绝对没有[/strike]。

[h2]缺点[/h2]
[b]容易晕 3D[/b]，穿越传送门时，头会自动修正转动角度。有时角度修正过头了，进出传送门时原来指针正对的物品不再对着了，导至反应不过来、头晕。这在穿越两个垂直或在同一平面上的传送门时尤为严重[strike]，你有时在进入同一平面上的传送门时能看到 Chell 身子是呈 T 状倒着进入传送门的。[/strike]
[b]瘆得慌[/b]，甚至让我恶心。玩一周目没什么特殊的感觉，就是逃脱时心里发毛。二周目做成就时那毛骨悚然的感觉就猛地上来了：在逃脱时的场景我觉得别扭，起鸡皮疙瘩。还有在搞“[b]接收讯息[/b]”成就时的噪音，只有它时就是起鸡皮疙瘩，和逃脱时的场景配到一起就是恶心、想吐，做这个成就对我来说简直就是折磨[spoiler]，幸好这个成就是最后做的，做完就直接关游戏，我真的再也不想打开 Portal 了[/spoiler]。

[hr][/hr]
[h2]总结[/h2]
胆小、晕 3D 的各位还是不要折磨自己了，推荐云通关。
对其他人来说：近史低 7 元，捆绑包也才 11 元，买就对了。

[hr][/hr]
[h2]小剧场：蒙圈科技（？）[/h2]

以下是本人解锁“[b]光圈科技[/b]”成就全过程：

打开 Portal！
奖励关卡！
挑战！
（选中某个未完成的关卡）
载入！
`（打开控制台）！
sv_cheats 1！
noclip！
（飞到电梯旁边）
noclip！
sv_cheats 0！
保存游戏！
新游戏！
实验室 00！
载入游戏！
（跑入电梯）
（角落闪出 3 个 1/18 字样）
（重复 17 次）

本人实在是做不到高难度操作[strike]，才不是我懒得学大佬的操作呢[/strike]。
[spoiler]挑战真好玩，嘿嘿嘿[/spoiler]。

[hr][/hr]
[strike]你可以在门内开门，然后你就被挤出去了。[/strike]

[hr][/hr]
[h2]2021.2.3 更新[/h2]
[strike]为了亲爱的程琪桑，我食言了（指再也不打开传送门）[/strike]。

Definitely one of my favorite games ever after just the first playthrough, absolutely love this game. The puzzles, story bits, humor, landscape, physics, it's all perfect. 2nd game is great so far too but a different beast alltogether.

A work of art, artwork,[1] art piece, piece of art or art object is an artistic creation of aesthetic value. Except for "work of art", which may be used of any work regarded as art in its widest sense, including works from literature and music, these terms apply principally to tangible, physical forms of visual art:

    An example of fine art, such as a painting or sculpture or the videogame Portal.
    An object that has been designed specifically for its aesthetic appeal, such as a piece of jewellery.
    An object that has been designed for aesthetic appeal as well as functional purpose, as in interior design and much folk art.
    An object created for principally or entirely functional, religious or other non-aesthetic reasons which has come to be appreciated as art (often later, or by cultural outsiders).
    A non-ephemeral photograph or film.
    A work of installation art or conceptual art.

Used more broadly, the term is less commonly applied to:

    A fine work of architecture or landscape design
    A production of live performance, such as theater, ballet, opera, performance art, musical concert and other performing arts, and other ephemeral, non-tangible creations.

Very swag. I wish there was more in this game but portal 2 is there for a reason.

BEST GAME EVER!

Why?
1. Gameplay: even though this game was released in 2007, the gameplay is still unique. It's not a regular FPS, or something really hard. You have to think about the puzzles, and you have to solve them.
2. Story: it's not a story like "hey, we have a story, see? now kill every mobs in this place" - it really affects the gameplay (mainly at the end). Even though our main character doesn't speak at all, and we have only one "person" among her, it's cool. GLaDOS is the best villain ever.
3. Sequel: the sequel has also a lot of cool gameplay stuff, a great story (with more characters) and a co-op mode.
4. Community: mods, new games - mainly for Portal 2, but still, this game has a great community.

I recommend this game and also the sequel - if you wait for a sale, you can get both games under 2€, it's really a bargain.
If it's your first time with Portal, you'll probably spend at least 10 hours with it. Don't spoil the puzzles for yourself.

Portal é portal 2 só q mais cru, com toda certeza é muito bom como o segundo, mas o n tem como, o segundo é bem melhor em mecânicas, em contar história, e também sem dizer q portal é literalmente um mod de h2, e também pelo fato de ser BEM curto, zerei bem rápido comparado com o 2. Mas ainda vale a pena, jogar o primeiro definitivamente n é uma melhor experiencia q o 2, mas ainda é bom, o começo de uma ideia brilhante e genial. 8/10 :) barato e bom.

Oyun çok kısa sürüyor ama ikinci oyunu da yaptıkları için bu şikayet edilecek bir şey değil. Oyundaki atmosfer ve hikaye çok başarılı yapılmış. Hikayedeki bulmacalar zor değildi fakat bonus haritalardaki ileri düzey ve mücadele haritaları beni baya uğraştırdı. 

Not: Tüm 'En Az Adım' mücadelelerini altın madalya ile tamamlayan benimle iletişime geçsin tebrik etmek istiyorum.
